DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare way give advice provide support improve diet physical activity adult primary care patient elevate body mass index dysglycemia .
DOC.brief_title: Intervening Diabetes With Healthy Eating , Activity , Linkages To Healthcare - The I-D-HEALTH Study
DOC.detailed_description: This randomized comparative effectiveness trial evaluate health economic effect community-based intensive lifestyle intervention adult primary care patient elevate body mass index dysglycemia ( either type 2 diabetes pre-diabetes ) . The study use qualitative quantitative method assess reach , effectiveness , cost , adoption , implementation , maintenance clinical-community partnership offer intensive lifestyle intervention resource eligible adult primary care patient .
DOC.criteria: 1 . 18 year age old , AND 2 . Bodymass index â‰¥ 24 kg/m2 , AND 3 . Documented Dysglycemia : Either verification laboratory test ( Fasting Plasma Glucose 100125 mg/dl OR 2hour Postchallenge Plasma Glucose 140199 mg/dl OR A1c 5.7 % 10.9 % ) OR confirmation Type 2 diabetes mellitus selfreport verification Exclusion Criteria ( follow ) : Diseases/Conditions could limit lifespan and/or increase risk lifestyle intervention : 1 . Significant cardiovascular disease : Uncontrolled hypertension : systolic blood pressure > 180 mmHg diastolic blood pressure > 105 mmHg A1c > 10.9 % Heart attack , stroke , transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) past 6 month Chest pain , dizziness , faint physical exertion 2 . Lung disease : Chronic obstructive airway disease asthma require home oxygen 3 . Pregnancy 4 . Any known condition could limit ability become physically active limit life span < 5 year Exclusions relate metabolism : 1 . Use medication know produce hyperglycemia 2 . Known disease lead abnormal glucose metabolism , diabetes mellitus , include Cushing 's syndrome ; acromegaly ; pheochromocytoma ; chronic pancreatitis Exclusion condition behavior likely affect conduct study : 1 . Unable unwilling provide inform consent 2 . Unable communicate pertinent research study staff 3 . Unable read write English Spanish
